Package scotty.database

This package contains the data model database related code for Scotty.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Context
    A Context is a set of attributes, that can inherit attributes from its parent and contain sub-contexts within it.
    Database
    A Scotty database, basically a context with a contained map of Types.
    Instance
    An instance of a Scotty Type.
    Type
    A Type in a Scotty database.
    Value
    The values of a Scotty attribute.

Package scotty.database Description

This package contains the data model database related code for Scotty. Additionally, the classes in this package are available to the BeanShell scripts in the templates.
Since:
1.0
